channel.description: Recent content in temporary statistics on stochasmos

item.title: Temporary Statistics
item.description: I am speaking on statistics in June at the Denver SQL Server User Group but didn’t really want to rehash much of the same old information that I’ve heard in the past. There’s a wealth of information about how to interpret stat headers, density vectors, and histograms. There’s also been plenty of virtual ink spilled on when statistics are updated (if you have auto update enabled). One new(ish, to me) and interesting topic I stumbled across is the notion of temporary statistics.
